key.name: enabled
key.description: When enabled, mouse damper will run at login to stabilize mouse clicks.

key.name: delta-threshold
key.summary: The distance traveled while the mouse button is down before unfreezing movement.
key.description: When you depress a mouse button, movement will be temporarily frozen. The freeze gets cancelled if the mouse moves this amount in any direction while the button is depressed.

key.name: override-gtk-double-click-time
key.description: When enabled, use the custom double-click-time-override value instead of the system GTK setting.

key.name: double-click-time-override
key.description: The maximum time between two clicks to consider them a double-click event. Only used when override-gtk-double-click-time is enabled.
